summary.title: Professional Summary
summary.content: Highly skilled Software Engineer with 8+ years of experience in designing, developing, and implementing complex software solutions. Demonstrated expertise in full-stack development, system architecture, and team leadership. 5 years of full stack experience with JavaScript, React, Node, TypeScript and 2 years as a mobile engineer focusing on React Native. Proficient in Python and learning data science.

jobs.title: Software Development Engineer
highlights: Improved AMM Plans performance by up to 10× by refactoring critical navigation and rendering paths; reduced Instance Table → Compare load time from ~10s to ~1s, Instance Table → Insights from ~10s to ~2s, and Instance Table → Create from ~10s to near-instant.

Led end-to-end delivery of Plans Tracking by taking ownership midstream (~6 months into development), correcting misaligned requirements, and shipping a polished UX; added drag-and-drop, resizable widgets, and persisted metric/layout preferences.

Introduced scalable engineering patterns and new capabilities: drove adoption of a custom hook architecture used by multiple engineers to standardize data/state logic, and built an AI insights integration enabling users to generate contextual insights directly from graphs.

detailedInfo.description: Working on Adobe Marketing Mix Modeling (AMM) platform, focusing on performance optimization, new feature development, and engineering best practices.
achievements: Achieved 10× performance improvement in critical user flows
Led cross-functional project delivery with product and design teams
Built AI-powered insights integration from scratch
Established custom hook patterns adopted across the engineering team
Implemented drag-and-drop and persistent state management for better UX

jobs.title: Software Engineer
highlights: Worked on removing SMS as a 2FA method, saving the company around $7 million. Worked with product and design to introduce new screens, nudging users to sign up for other methods as well as introducing push notifications as a login method.

Integrated Fido two-factor authentication for PayPal and all PayPal companies, allowing for more security during the login process. Lead frontend engineer for the project, engineered and implemented new 2FA registration screens.
Full stack front-end focused engineer on the security experiences team, focusing on two-factor authentication, authflow and security settings.
Led effort to re-skin authnodeweb repo, responsible for password recovery, two factor login, and step up flows during login.

detailedInfo.description: Worked in the Risk and Identity organizations, focusing on authentication, two-factor authentication, and security experiences across PayPal and all PayPal companies.
achievements: Saved company $7 million by removing SMS as 2FA method
Lead frontend engineer for Fido 2FA integration
Re-skinned authentication flows across multiple products
Improved security while enhancing user experience

jobs.title: Software Engineer - Mobile, Frontend
highlights: Mobile Developer focusing on developing and maintaining HOTH, an app for warehouse workers to process and ship orders on the fulfillment side of the business.
Engineered and implemented a React Native components library to replace the Native Base components library for the warehouse fulfillment app.

detailedInfo.description: Developed and maintained HOTH, a mobile application for warehouse workers to efficiently process and ship orders in the fulfillment operations.
achievements: Built custom React Native component library from scratch
Replaced third-party UI library with custom solution
Improved app performance and customization capabilities
Enhanced warehouse worker productivity through better UX

jobs.title: Mobile Engineer
highlights: Hired as the first React Native engineer and developed a personal loan app from scratch in React Native that allows users to pay off their loans and view their loan information for Android and iOS.

detailedInfo.description: First React Native engineer at Avant, responsible for building a personal loan mobile application from the ground up for both iOS and Android platforms.
achievements: Built entire mobile app from scratch as sole React Native engineer
Delivered cross-platform solution for iOS and Android
Implemented loan payment and management features
Established mobile development practices and architecture
Launched app successfully to production for thousands of users
